scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:dev && npm run push:latest
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run build && npm run push
scripts.push:latest: docker tag ghcr.io/theorlovsky/auto_mhddos:$(npm --loglevel=silent run version) ghcr.io/theorlovsky/auto_mhddos:latest && docker push ghcr.io/theorlovsky/auto_mhddos:latest
scripts.start: npm run build && docker run -it --rm ghcr.io/theorlovsky/auto_mhddos:$(npm --loglevel=silent run version)
